title: launcher crashes when trying to start
body: double click launcher crashes no reason given...

replies.body: The same thing happened to me when i click the icon on my desktop.

I'd like to help out but need some more details.  When you say crash, are you receiving any error messages?  Also, when you say launcher do you mean the icon on your desktop or the actual Launch button on the patcher?  Anything can help, let me know!
